type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.gradle.GradleScript
type.description: * Represents a Gradle script. A Gradle script may be a build script, settings script or initialization script. * * @since 1.8

method.name: getSourceFile
method.description: * Returns the source file for this script, or {@code null} if this script has no associated source file. * If this method returns a non-null value, the given source file will exist. * * @return The source file. Returns null if the script has no associated source file. * @since 1.8

property.name: sourceFile
property.description: * Returns the source file for this script, or {@code null} if this script has no associated source file. * If this method returns a non-null value, the given source file will exist. * * @return The source file. Returns null if the script has no associated source file. * @since 1.8
